SEARCH
Package net.replaceitem.reconfigure.config.serialization

Class Marshaller<T>

java.lang.Object
net.replaceitem.reconfigure.config.serialization.Marshaller<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type the Serializer expects for serialization.
public abstract class Marshaller<T> extends Object
This class converts from a Serialization specific format (e.g. JsonElement or NbtElement) to an Intermediary and back. Each Serializer has its own Marshaller. The JsonSerializer for example uses JsonElement. The Marshaller for Json would thus convert from JsonElement to an Intermediary.
